definitions.definition: scatter or pour small drops or particles of a substance over (an object or surface).
examples: I sprinkled the floor with water
synonyms: shower; Morespatter "he sprinkled water over the towel"scatter
pepper "sprinkle sesame seeds over the top"

definitions.definition: scatter or pour (small drops or particles of a substance) over an object or surface.
examples: sprinkle sesame seeds over the top
synonyms: dust "sprinkle the cake with powdered sugar"

definitions.definition: distribute or disperse something randomly or irregularly throughout (something).
examples: he sprinkled his conversation with quotations
synonyms: cover "the sky was sprinkled with stars"

definitions.definition: place or attach (a number of things) at irregularly spaced intervals.
examples: a dress with little daisies sprinkled all over it

definitions.definition: a small quantity or amount of something scattered over an object or surface.
tiny sugar shapes, typically rods and balls, used for decorating cakes, ice cream, and other desserts.
